title: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, under the Text tab, when selecting SWT.MULTI, the application emits a beep sound. This behavior also occurs when selecting other buttons. However, I believe this behavior is not intended.
OB: When choosing SWT.MULTI, a beep sound is heard. Clicking on other buttons also triggers the same sound.
EB: When selecting SWT.MULTI, no beep sound should be heard. Clicking on other buttons should not produce any sound.
SR:
Build F1 (20020521)Win2K (I'm not sure if this is SWT or just the SWT Example)

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Navigate to the Text tab.
3. Click on the Styles SWT.SINGLE button.
4. Click on the Styles SWT.MULTI button.
